ModMetaData.name: Moosesian race
ModMetaData.author: Waffel F.
ModMetaData.description: "Would you like a race that make linear warfare viable in an age of mechanoid-space-aliens?" "Do you like big mommy with big gun?" If yes, you've found your place. A fictional race of tall moose people based on Napoleonic Wars aesthetic, focusing on unleashing a slow but devastating damage on the enemy, tough enough to take considerable punishments. Come with their own tech trees and various items. Currently only have female. Racial attributes : + High pain tolerance. + High movement speed. + High unarmed melee damage. + High strength, capable of carrying heavy items. + Very tough, each body part has 2.5 times human health. + Low Mental break threshold, immune to mood debuff from eating raw foods or kibbles. -: Social fighting can be lethal if the receiving end of that punch is normal human or weaker, Moosesian don't hold back. -: Being so large and tall make them a good target practice. -: Penalty to research speed. Race-exclusive Weapons characteristics: + High caliber, high damage firearms with great penetration. + Primitive but exceedingly large melee weapons. -: Generally inaccurate range weapons. -: Slow cooldown between each attack/shot on both ranged and melee weapons, each miss is a huge DPS loss.
